resources.string: Address: Karni Industrial Area,Pugal Road Bikaner(Rajasthan) \nPin Code 334004

Govt Engineering College Bikaner was founded in 1999 and offers courses like B. Tech, MBA, MCA, M. Sc. (CS), BBA, BCA Most of the faculty members have completed their degrees from IIT/ NIT/BITS Pilani etc.College has facilities like hostels, bank, dispensary, fleet of buses, WiFi campus, canteen, communication lab etc.he campus interviews are conducted by blue chip companies like IBM, NBC, Kirloskar, IDBI, Simplex Infrastructure etc.
